experiences.description: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines for processing large volumes of data from various sources. Implemented data quality checks and monitoring systems. Optimized database performance for faster query execution. Technologies used: Hadoop, Spark, Hive, SQL Server.

Led the design and implementation of a new data warehouse solution on AWS. Mentored junior data engineers. Collaborated with data scientists to build machine learning pipelines. Responsible for data security and compliance. Technologies used: AWS (S3, EC2, Redshift, EMR), Python, SQL, Airflow.

Architected and implemented a scalable data platform for real-time analytics. Defined data governance policies and standards. Conducted research on new data technologies and tools. Managed a team of data engineers. Technologies used: Kafka, Spark Streaming, Cassandra, Kubernetes, GCP.

education.description: Focused on algorithms, data structures, and database systems. Completed a thesis on distributed data processing.
Specialized in machine learning, data mining, and statistical modeling. Participated in research projects related to big data analytics.
